00003 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00004 // Name: TrimExtension
00005 // Desc: Trim filepath by ".*"
00006 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00007 void FilePath::TrimExtension()
00008 {
00009         LPTSTR ptpos = _tcsrchr(chars, '.');
00010         if(!ptpos)
00011                 return;
00012 
00013         len = ptpos - chars;
00014         chars = (LPTSTR)realloc(chars, len + 1);
00015         chars[len] = NULL;
00016 }
00017 
00018 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 // Name: GetExtension
00020 // Desc: Get filepath at the last '.'
00021 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 String* FilePath::GetExtension(String* result)
00023 {
00024         LPTSTR ptpos = _tcsrchr(chars, '.');
00025         if(!ptpos)
00026                 *result = String();
00027         else
00028                 *result = String(ptpos + 1);
00029 
00030         return result;
00031 }
00032 
00033 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // Name: AddSuffix
00035 // Desc: Add the given string before the last '.'
00036 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 FilePath* FilePath::AddSuffix(String suffix, FilePath* result)
00038 {
00039         String ext;
00040         this->GetExtension(&ext);
00041 
00042         *result = String(chars);
00043         result->TrimExtension();
00044 
00045         *result <<= suffix << String('.') << ext;
00046 
00047         return result;
00048 }
